divs: Sighting DetailsMyself and my children coming home and we see a very bright round light in the bush, (paddock,treed area)about tree level, we thought a farm light but not possible in its location,seemed to be hovering and moving very slowly as we drove, we drove about 10km with the light still visible,lost sight of it, we arrived home and saw the light again even though we originally saw 20km away. Then it just seems to vanish.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Beverley
There were no other sightings in Beverley on or around December 13th 2012
